info.title: B2B Scenarios
info.description:
The B2B Scenarios OData API is used to access data related to inter-enterprise business integration scenarios. 
 With this API, you can securely query business documents, thereby supporting efficient data exchange and business process collaboration between enterprises.

externalDocs.description: SAP Integration Suite documentation: OData API - B2B Scenarios

x-sap-shortText: Facilitates data exchange for B2B processes using OData

x-servers.description: SAP Cloud Integration REST API Endpoint

Account Short Name.description: SAP BTP subaccount short name where Cloud Integration is provided

x-servers.description: SAP Cloud Integration Custom Domain Endpoint - see [Configuring Custom Domains](https://help.sap.com/viewer/368c481cd6954bdfa5d0435479fd4eaf/Cloud/en-US/7230b9ff41914cc0969223e6a020104b.html)

Custom Name.description: Your defined name for your Cloud Integration account.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all orphaned interchanges available in the system. This endpoint supports filtering, ordering, and selecting specific properties.
get.summary: Get all orphaned interchanges.

parameters.name: $inlinecount
parameters.description: Count the number of retrieved entries by selecting ```allpages```.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values.
For any Id filter use only the 'eq' operator.
Example: ```LastErrorDetails/ErrorCategory eq 'MESSAGE_DECRYPTION'``` returns the number of interchange documents with error category 'MESSAGE_DECRYPTION'

get.description: You can use the following request to get unassigned interchange document by Guid.
get.summary: Get unassigned interchange document by Guid.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the orphaned interchange.

get.description: You can use the following request to get number of all unassigned interchange documents.
get.summary: Get number of all unassigned interchange documents.

200.description: Number of retrieved unassigned interchange documents

get.description: You can use the following request to get unassigned interchange document's error detail by Guid.
get.summary: Get unassigned interchange document's error detail by Guid.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Guid of the unassigned interchange document

get.description: You can use the following request to get unassigned interchange document's processing event by Guid.
get.summary: Get unassigned interchange document's processing event by Guid.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Guid of the unassigned interchange document

200.description: Retrieved unassigned interchange document's processing event

get.description: You can use the following request to get unassigned interchange document's payload by Guid.
get.summary: Get unassigned interchange document's payload by Guid.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Guid of the unassigned interchange document

200.description: Retrieved unassigned interchange document's processing event

get.description: You can use the following request to get unassigned interchange document's protocol headers by Guid.
get.summary: Get unassigned interchange document's protocol headers by Guid.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Guid of the unassigned interchange document

200.description: Retrieved unassigned interchange document's protocol headers

get.description: Retrieve a list of all inter-enterprise business documents available in the system. This endpoint supports filtering, ordering, and selecting specific properties.
get.summary: Get all interchange documents.

parameters.name: $inlinecount
parameters.description: Count the number of retrieved entries by selecting ```allpages```.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values.
For any Id filter use only the 'eq' operator.
Example: ```Status eq 'FAILED'``` returns document with status 'FAILED'.
IntegrationFlowName is deprecated. In queries filtering for IntegrationFlowName, this will be substituted automatically by IntegrationFlow/Id

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description:
Order items by property values.
IntegrationFlowName is deprecated.

get.description: You can use the following request to get interchange document's custom search attributes by Guid. The B2B Scenarios tab under the Monitor section allows you to monitor the interchanges that are created during a B2B transaction. The interchanges are displayed in a list with a list of filters using which helps you find a specific interchange easily. These search filters are provided in a standard format. There could be scenarios where you need to search for an interchange using a filter that is not provided in general. In such cases, the Configuration Manager allows you to create and use custom search attributes.
get.summary: Get interchange document's custom search attributes by Guid.

200.description: Retrieved interchange document's custom search attributes

post.description: This API is only present in the Cloud Foundry environment. You can use the following request to acitvate the archiving functionality in your tenant.

results: Archiving successfully enabled for tenant xy

403.description:
Access forbidden - you did not have the required permissions to activate the archiving in this tenant.
In API sandbox any write access is refused

500.description: Internal server error - parameter values are not provided in the expected hex encoded format.

get.description: This API is only present in the Cloud Foundry environment. You can use the following request to acitvate the archiving functionality in your tenant.
get.summary: Get archiving configuration for a tenant

200.description: Retrieved value for archiving configuration of this tenant

results: Archiving configured has value: true on tenant xy

get.description: This API is only present in the Cloud Foundry environment. You can use the following request to get the Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) of the archiving runs.
get.summary: Get Key Performance Indicators of the archiving run

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values.
For any Id filter use only the 'eq' operator.

schema.title: Collection of B2B archiving key performance indicators

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items.

400.description: Bad Request. Wrong format or structure of the provided request body.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authorization information is missing or invalid.

403.description:
Access forbidden - you did not have the required permissions to access the resource.
In API sandbox any write access is refused.

application/json.message: Sorry! API sandbox only supports the 'Try-it-out' feature for GET operations. To test a write operation, please test the API against your own tenant account of SAP Cloud Integration by configuring the corresponding API endpoint.

500.description: Internal server error. The requested operation led to an error during execution.
